name: The Heart Beyond Darkness
description:
Have you ever had afraid of darkness?

The game tells about the journey of a minion that was sent for his master to search and kill a girl that lives in the middle of forest.

The narrative happens inside mind of the main character, questioning to himself about moral decisions that leads the player to two different ends.

Instructions:

Arrows to move, space bar to jump.
